4301770.name: Distorted Signal
4301770.description:
Distorted Signal is a thrilling road trip adventure set on a forgotten planet where silence has lasted for millions of years. You are a wanderer in a world of ancient ruins, and only a mysterious, repeating signal breaks the silence of this lost land.

Get behind the wheel of a space car and embark on a journey into the unknown. Be alert, act boldly, and prove yourself capable of surviving even the most unpredictable conditions.

Your mission is to find and collect rare energy batteries scattered among the remains of an ancient civilization. Each battery you find brings you closer to launching a giant antenna—the last beacon in this dead world. It must capture and decipher the mysterious signal.
4301770.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
